effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user flashes a bright light that cuts
the target’s accuracy.
It can also be used to illuminate caves.

The user flashes a bright light that cuts
the target’s accuracy.
It can also be used to illuminate caves.
